label: 二王
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The Two Kings are guardian deities whose images often flank temple entrance gates, as at the Great South Gate of the Tōdaiji in Nara (p. 741n).  [東大寺、奈良]
